RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: OLTMS_CONTRAC_FLRCLG_EFFDAT.CONTRACT_REF_NO = OLTMS_CONTRACT_FLRCLG_RATE.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND OLTMS_CONTRAC_FLRCLG_EFFDAT.CCY_CODE = OLTMS_CONTRACT_FLRCLG_RATE.CCY_CODE AND OLTMS_CONTRAC_FLRCLG_EFFDAT.EFF_DATE = OLTMS_CONTRACT_FLRCLG_RATE.EFF_DATE

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.CONTRACT_REF_NO, B.USER_REF_NO, A.PRODUCT_CODE, A.COUNTERPARTY, B.FACILITY_NAME, A.CONTRACT_CCY, (SELECT CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER WHERE CUSTOMER_NO = A.COUNTERPARTY) CUST_NAME, (SELECT PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = A.PRODUCT_CODE) PROD_DESC FROM OLTB_CONTRACT_MASTER B, OLTB_CONTRACT A WHERE A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = B.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND A.LATEST_VERSION_NO = B.VERSION_NO AND A.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'C' AND A.AUTH_STATUS = 'A' AND A.BRANCH = sypks_utils.get_branch(A.CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND A.CONTRACT_STATUS NOT IN ('V', 'L') AND A.MODULE_CODE = 'OL' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLVWS_AVL_PROD_BR_USR WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = A.PRODUCT_CODE AND BRANCH_CODE = sypks_utils.get_branch(A.CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND USER_ID = GLOBAL.USER_ID)

SELECT C.CCY_CODE, C.CCY_NAME FROM CYTMS_CCY_DEFN C WHERE C.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND C.RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT_CCY_DISALLOW D, OLTMS_PRODUCT P WHERE D.PRODUCT_CODE = sypks_utils.get_product(?) AND D.BOUGHT_DEAL_CCY = C.CCY_CODE AND P.PRODUCT_CODE = D.PRODUCT_CODE AND NVL(P.CURRENCIES_LIST, 'D') = 'D') OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT_CCY_DISALLOW D, OLTMS_PRODUCT P WHERE D.PRODUCT_CODE = sypks_utils.get_product(?) AND D.BOUGHT_DEAL_CCY = C.CCY_CODE AND P.PRODUCT_CODE = D.PRODUCT_CODE AND NVL(P.CURRENCIES_LIST, 'D') = 'A')) ORDER BY CCY_CODE
SELECT PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT WHERE MODULE = 'OL' AND PRODUCT_TYPE = 'L' AND RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' ORDER BY PRODUCT_CODE

SELECT C.PRODUCT, C.COMPONENT, C.COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION FROM LFTMS_PRODUCT_ICCF C WHERE C.PRODUCT = ? AND C.RATE_TYPE IN ('F', 'X') AND COMPONENT NOT IN (SELECT D.NEGATIVE_CLASS_CODE FROM LFTMS_PRODUCT_ICCF D WHERE C.COMPONENT = D.COMPONENT AND C.PRODUCT = D.PRODUCT AND NVL(D.SHOWN_IN_CONTRACT_MAIN_SCREEN, 'N') = 'Y' AND NVL(D.NEGATIVE_INTEREST_RATE_ALLOWED, 'N') = 'Y'AND D.NEGATIVE_CLASS_CODE IS NOT NULL)
